title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 71.3 - Licensing examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 71.3 - Licensing examinations

State Regulations

The department may accept a passing score on an examination
determined by the State Board for Certified Shorthand Reporting to be
acceptable for licensure as a certified shorthand reporter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
71.3

Amended

New

York State Register July 27, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 30, eff. 7/27/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
